about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a brave young man in Silent Whisper, a spine-chilling first-person horror experience that will test your courage, wits, and survival instincts.

Drawn to an abandoned school with a tragic and haunting history, your curiosity quickly turns into a nightmare. Once inside, everything goes wrong, trapping you in a crumbling building filled with dark secrets. As you explore its decaying halls and eerie classrooms, you'll uncover the grim truth behind the school's past.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Experience the dread of exploring an abandoned school brought to life with eerie visuals, haunting sound design, and dynamic lighting.

  • Exploration: Search the rundown building for clues and escape routes, unraveling its sinister mysteries along the way.

  • Tension-Fueled Survival: Evade terrifying entities that lurk in the darkness, using stealth and clever tactics to stay alive.

  • Uncover the Past: Piece together the heartbreaking story of what happened to the students and staff through journals, notes, and artifacts.

Will you conquer your fears and escape, or will the Silent Whisper claim another victim?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon R7 260
  • DirectX: Version 6.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Silent Whisper is a single-player horror game that takes you into an abandoned school with a haunting past. What begins as simple exploration turns into a nightmare. Navigate its decaying halls, uncover dark secrets, and do whatever it takes to escape—or risk becoming another victim.
